trans-unit.source: LuWiji is a package full of machine learning illustrations and widgets
trans-unit.target: LuWiji是一个充满机器学习插图和小工具的软件包。

trans-unit.source: LuWiji is a package full of machine learning illustrations and widgets. It is designed to help instructor in teaching machine learning visually, and to make machine learning accessible for people with no math background.
trans-unit.target: LuWiji是一个充满机器学习插图和小工具的软件包。它的设计目的是为了帮助讲师直观地教授机器学习,并使没有数学背景的人也能理解机器学习。

trans-unit.source: The project started in March 2019 together with the development of J.COp ML project. Both LuWiji and J.COpML is developed by Wira D. K. Putra as complementary for his machine learning curriculum for young machine learning enthusiast.
trans-unit.target: 该项目于2019年3月与J.COp ML项目的开发一同启动。LuWiji和J.COpML都是由Wira D.K.Putra开发的,作为他针对年轻机器学习爱好者的机器学习课程的补充。
